name: Create a Revolut Business draft payment and send a Slack notification from a new Shopify order
description:
Use this template to create a Revolut draft payment to a supplier and send a Slack notification once a Shopify order is created.

The setup of the template assumes you have your supplier data stored in an Airtable table. Your table has to include these fields: Name of the supplier (First name and Last name if the supplier is an individual), Shopify product ID, Price you pay for the product to the supplier and payment details. 

To see which details are required to create a Revolut draft payment depending on the country, click [here](https://developer.revolut.com/docs/build-banking-apps/#tutorials-tutorials-work-with-draft-payments-international-payments). For example, if you're creating a payment to the United Kingdom, your Airtable table needs to include an Account Number and a Sort Code; for payment to Germany, it's IBAN and BIC.
